original: unfold Nat.Even. intros H. apply g_nlb_ind with (P := fun n l => n <> 0 -> rem n 2 = 0 -> l = ⟘ :: ⟬ div n 2 ⟭ -> ⟬ 2 * n ⟭ = ⟘ :: l). - intros H0 H1. exfalso. apply H0. auto. - intros n0 l H0 H1 Hg Hl. simpl. rewrite lb_nat_fix_1. apply in_gnlb_1. apply Nat.neq_0_lt_0. apply Nat.neq_0_lt_0 in H0. unfold Nat.Even in Hg. destruct Hg as [m Hg]. rewrite <- Hg. apply Nat.mul_comm. replace (S (lb_nat l)) with (div (2 * n0) 2). rewrite Nat.mul_comm. auto. simpl in *. rewrite Nat.mul_add_distr_l. auto. - intros n0 l H0 H1 Hg Hl. exfalso. apply Nat.neq_0_lt_0 in H0. apply H0. - repeat intro. simpl. trivial.
